EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA.201802_Global_Email_ConnectedAircraft_BGA_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Check Our List – Jets Now Certified for Super-Fast Wi-Fi! ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Upgrade Your Business Jet with Global High-Speed Wi-Fi! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Are you wondering how you can upgrade your business jet with global high-speed Wi-Fi? Do you want to have the same Wi-Fi experience at 35,000 feet as you do on the ground? Honeywell’s JetWave™ system which exclusively powers Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX Ka-band service, is now certified on more than 16 aircraft models with more coming onboard! Check out the full list here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/infographics/jetwavecertificationlistfebruary2018.pdf]]>.
There’s a reason why all the major business jet manufacturers have selected JetWave™ – we enable Wi-Fi that flies.
Don’t miss out on your chance to be an early adopter, and not a laggard!
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Setting-New-Standards-for-In-Flight-Connectivity]]>
